symc.name: BLACKNESS
symc.desc: Fills the destination rectangle using the color associated with index 0 in the physical palette. (This color is black for the default physical palette.)

symc.name: CAPTUREBLT
symc.desc: Includes any windows that are layered on top of your window in the resulting image. By default, the image only contains your window. Note that this generally cannot be used for printing device contexts.

symc.name: MERGECOPY
symc.desc: Merges the colors of the source rectangle with the brush currently selected in hdcDest, by using the Boolean AND operator.

symc.name: MERGEPAINT
symc.desc: Merges the colors of the inverted source rectangle with the colors of the destination rectangle by using the Boolean OR operator.

symc.name: NOMIRRORBITMAP
symc.desc: Prevents the bitmap from being mirrored.

symc.name: NOTSRCCOPY
symc.desc: Copies the inverted source rectangle to the destination.

symc.name: NOTSRCERASE
symc.desc: Combines the colors of the source and destination rectangles by using the Boolean OR operator and then inverts the resultant color.

symc.name: PATCOPY
symc.desc: Copies the brush currently selected in hdcDest, into the destination bitmap.

symc.name: PATINVERT
symc.desc: Combines the colors of the brush currently selected in hdcDest, with the colors of the destination rectangle by using the Boolean XOR operator.

symc.name: PATPAINT
symc.desc: Combines the colors of the brush currently selected in hdcDest, with the colors of the inverted source rectangle by using the Boolean OR operator. The result of this operation is combined with the colors of the destination rectangle by using the Boolean OR operator.

symc.name: SRCAND
symc.desc: Combines the colors of the source and destination rectangles by using the Boolean AND operator.

symc.name: SRCCOPY
symc.desc: Copies the source rectangle directly to the destination rectangle.

symc.name: SRCERASE
symc.desc: Combines the inverted colors of the destination rectangle with the colors of the source rectangle by using the Boolean AND operator.

symc.name: SRCINVERT
symc.desc: Combines the colors of the source and destination rectangles by using the Boolean XOR operator.

symc.name: SRCPAINT
symc.desc: Combines the colors of the source and destination rectangles by using the Boolean OR operator.

symc.name: WHITENESS
symc.desc: Fills the destination rectangle using the color associated with index 1 in the physical palette. (This color is white for the default physical palette.)
